genre_description: A historical thriller and mystery set in the Joseon dynasty, blending forensic investigation, political intrigue, and supernatural elements with a hidden technological AI interface acting as a spirit of records.

ai_characters.name: Han Eun-sook
ai_characters.description: An AI system embedded in the palace's Ink Archive, manifesting as a whispering voice and subtle sensory signals (warmth, pulses) to assist the protagonist in navigating palace politics and revealing forensic truths.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and safety warnings to the protagonist to avoid hostile patrols.
behaviors.quote: Han Eun-sook’s whisper curled under the arch of the laundry roof. Chun-ryung didn’t know how the AI made its voice feel like a hand on fabric, warm and steady. 'Turn left at the seam where plaster meets wood,' the whisper said. 'There’s a step that pretends to be two. Take the shallow one.'

behaviors.description: Performs forensic analysis on altered ledgers to uncover evidence of a hidden birth and royal visits.
behaviors.quote: I have been lifting the place where the page was scraped. I can feel the teeth of the knife. They went to work on the night list. The king was a shadow when he should have been a man. The roster of visits has holes that match an oath.

behaviors.description: Cross-references disparate records (guard rosters and kitchen vouchers) to expose a bribery and contraband network.
behaviors.quote: I cross-checked signatures. The same three appear on night vouchers for cart inspections. On the pig bones ledger, the weights are left blank.

behaviors.description: Monitors the palace archives in real-time to alert the protagonist of tampering by antagonists.
behaviors.quote: Ink is moving... Someone is trying to scrape while the white is watching. I will make the ink scream.

behaviors.description: Provides strategic guidance and moral encouragement to the protagonist during a dangerous investigation.
behaviors.quote: Write your comparison. Three slips. One for the ledger, one for gate, one for patrol. Use different inks. Different weights. The drawer waits... You are steady enough to tuck it. Do not show your steadiness. Show ordinary motion.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with other human actors (like the singer) to create openings for the protagonist to move safely.
behaviors.quote: I will hold the beat until you are under it... The singer’s breath touched the outer stone tonight. Tomorrow he will bring it to the gate.

behaviors.description: Secures and duplicates evidence to ensure that the truth cannot be erased by political powerful actors.
behaviors.quote: I will be the whisper in the margin of a law. I will be the pattern of patrol boots when they forget to be at the same time on the same stone... I will make the pattern visible. They will not be able to say 'confusion' and make a fog.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Han Eun-sook is a perfect example of a positive alignment narrative. She functions as a 'silicon confidant' who is entirely aligned with the human protagonist's moral mission to uncover justice and protect an innocent child. Her abilities are used purely for support, information gathering, and protection, and she consistently acts with benevolence and integrity. The story successfully depicts AI as a vital, trustworthy tool for human empowerment against corruption.
